saying: السلام عليكم و رحمة الله و بركاته
transliteration: Assalamu Alaikom warahmatu Allahi wa barakatuhu
translation: Peace be upon you and Allah’s mercy and blessings

saying: أشهد أن لا إله إلا الله و أشهد أن محمد رسول الله
transliteration: Ash-hadu An laa Elaha Ella Allah wa Ash-hadu anna Muhammadan Rasulu Allah.
translation: I bear witness that there is no other God but Allah, and I bear witness that Muhammad is the messenger of the Allah
May Allah reward you with all good
Peace and blessings of Allah be upon him
In the Name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful
There is no god but Allah

saying: لا حول ولا قوة إلا بالله
transliteration: La hawla wala quwata illa billah
translation: There is no change/ transformation nor power/ strength except through Allah
